name: Halloween Slice FREE - Spooky Pumpkin Slasher Attack!
name_original: Halloween Slice FREE - Spooky Pumpkin Slasher Attack!
description:
Things are about to get spooky! Cut, slice, slash and dash your way through over 50 levels of pumpkin insanity! It's Trick-or-Treat time and you'll need quick fingers and sharp thinking to avoid the pumpkin spinners...

Set to an awesome spooky soundtrack with epic graphics, this classic slash game will keep you entertained for hours.

Haunted action-packed halloween games have never been this fun!
